item.title: How do i get ::dragon ::allgodarmor ::haroks
item.dc:creator: @cook cook
item.description:
@cook wrote:

//note//
this is using a taylor source its probly different from your source tell me your source and ill change for you source
//end of note//

Frist a Dragon set command

		}
			} else if (command.startsWith("dset")) {
				{
			addItem(1149,1); 
						addItem(3140,1);
						addItem(4087,1);
						addItem(1187,1);
						addItem(7461,1);
sendMessage("The other ::dragon is a bit to big :P");

now for god armours

		}	
			} else if (command.startsWith("saradomin")) {
				{
			addItem(2412,1);
			addItem(2665,1);
			addItem(2667,1);
			addItem(2663,1);
			addItem(2661,1);
			addItem(2415,1);
sendMessage("Nice to bring a bit of goodness");		 	
		}	
			} else if (command.startsWith("zamorak")) {
				{
				addItem(2414,1);
				addItem(2657,1);
				addItem(2659,1);
				addItem(2655,1);
				addItem(2653,1);
				addItem(2417,1);
sendMessage("Nice to bring a bit of evilness");  			
		} 
			} else if (command.startsWith("guthix")) { 
				{
			addItem(2413,1);
			addItem(2673,1);
			addItem(2675,1);
			addItem(2671,1);
			addItem(2669,1);
			addItem(2416,1);
sendMessage("Nice to bring a bit of balance");

And Horaks (i asume means dharoks)

} else if (command.startsWith("dharok")) { { addItem(4716,1); addItem(4718,1); addItem(4720,1); addItem(4722,1); addItem(7462,1); sendMessage("Dharok the Wretched armour!");

ADD THEM TO YOUR COMMANDS
(if you dont know where commands are press ctrl + F and look for end of fr and end of frame testing should be there add these commands under it(then save compile and play))
